I love the pants they are very comfortable true to size .. I love the shade of navy blue
I love the fit, the ZIPPERED pockets and the lightweight fabric. Living in Florida, the lightweight fabric was the selling point for me. I will be ordering one in every color available now

the same pair in black fit great and these didnt fit well at all. the waist band was big, the legs were tight and the seat of the pants was baggy. It was as though they were made from a completely different company.
These joggers are what I was looking for - I now own 2 pairs, navy blue and brown.  Well worth the investment.
I love the pants.  They fit great.  Easy to pack and lightweight.

评论概述: Fit is good but the fabric was not stretchy for sport
评论详情: The fit was nice, they are lightweight and quick dry, but unfortunately I had to return them because I was hoping for pants with more stretch. I like joggers for lifting weights and running so I needed some stretch for movement. These might be fine for walking or regular daily activities. I also am 5'8" so the fact that I'm tall may have made the fit even more taught. I would not want to size up though because then they would be extremely baggy.

These are lightweight and were perfect for a windy day reading on the beach. I’ve worn these a few times since I got them 3 weeks ago and they’ve been comfortable each time even after washing. The zipper pockets were nice. I typically wear sizes 12-14 and I ordered a  XL.
Very lightweight & comfortable. Wish they had larger pockets but they were perfect for wet weather.
The pants are not the best option. Sizes are different. Unfortunately stuck with them since I missed the return window. Will be donating.
Just ok. Easy to launder. Not cute on.
Fits well; comfortable and light.

I love the color and the weight of this fabric, VERY comfortable. But, they do run a bit on the large size - at least for me. I ordered large, as suggested, but am returning them and will try a medium.
Bought these for both fishing and golfing. I love them. They are breathable and worked great for me.

I ordered a large LIBIN women’s lightweight joggers quick dry hiking running pants in silver sage. I am 5”1’ tall and 108 pounds. My hip is 37.” And my natural waist is 26.5” but my belly button circumference where most waistbands sit is 32” when I am bloated and 30” when I am not. I usually have to wear a small or medium but it depends on the brand and cut. I used the size chart based on waist for when I am bloated. And I ordered a large based on the waist 31-33”. That was a huge mistake. I included photos. Because I am only 5”1’ these pants at a 28 inch inseam are way too long. Use your natural waist not where the pants would sit. When I order shorts I do have to use my belly button circumference as my waist in order to not get a muffin top. But these joggers are very generous. Even if I had ordered a canal or small they would still be way too long.

评论概述: Half the price of similar joggers
评论详情: i originally ordered these in small based on the sizing chart and a mix of other reviews. They were too tight in the thighs for my preference, though the waist and hips were fine.  Returned and ordered medium.  Medium's are perfect, but don't seem actually larger in the waist and minimally larger in the hips, but the size is perfect for me.  5'6, 135, W 27, H 39, thighs 22.5.  The waist is elastic with a drawstring, so I would err on sizing up. I don't wear them for hiking or anything outdoors/athletic, I WFH and am building up comfortable 'real' clothes to work in that I can also leave the house in as my prior job was business professional, I am lacking and these are perfect. I have two pair of very similar joggers from Fabletics that I love, but are too pricey at non sale prices to justify and these are a perfect substitute, and honestly even a little better b/c the pockets zip.
Too short.  I am 5'6".  Ordered M.

Although I really love the color, appearance, and overall quality of these joggers, I was disappointed when one pair of the identical size was much smaller than the other pair, which fit perfectly. Based on the recommended sizing, I ordered 2 in a size small; the blue fit, the green did not. So, while I do love the ones I can wear, the other pair is useless unless I lose 15 lbs or so!
These are from the same company that my recent capri purchase was made. Fit is great. Just as I expected which is always super!
High quality. Comfortable.
Super comfortable and slimming!

Son super comodos, libianos, frescos, facil de secar, tiene cierres en los bolsillos y es bueno porque no se salen las cosas, el tallaje es ideal yo compre talla L y fue perfecto para mi, los resortes que tiene tanto en la cintura como en el tobillo son comodos. Me encantan!
baggy, thin way too baggy to be joggers but they were water resistant might wear on a rainy track meet

I bought these pants for a trip to Africa and was HOPING they would fit and be comfortable and they were BOTH! So very comfortable - easy to move in - feel very soft and lightweight on my skin.  I haven't gone to Africa yet so I couldn't rate whether or not they are waterproof, but I will update as soon as I do.  I am 5'5 and weigh 138 lbs and got the M and it fit perfect!

Am age 68, 5’1, 125#, usually a 6-8 in pants. Ordered size S, which ran slightly large, but you don’t really want a tight fit in this type of pants. I am going to reorder another color in size XS, which should be fine. Will keep this pair, as the fit isn’t that bad. Very lightweight and trim. Haven’t washed yet, but they should be fine. Dark gray color looks good. Waistband is wide & comfortable ( am short- waisted, so won’t be tucking any shirts in). Ankles are gathered, so my usual job of hemming my pants (yep, legs are short, too, at 29”. Heck, I am short everywhere!) Altogether, am happy with these pants, but will go down a size for my reorder; not the manufacturer’s issue in any way.

评论概述: These are very baggy I hips and legs
评论详情: I have been buying medium and tossed the tags as I figured they would fit; so now I’m stuck with a too large pair of joggers.
These pants are comfortable, fit great, breathable, functional.

A coworker wore these pants one day last week. She said she has had them for a few years, bought them on Amazon, and told me the brand.  I'm leary to purchase products, especially clothing, without seeing it in person or from an unfamiliar brand that I never purchased before. I like to see the clothing in person, so I can get an idea of quality, material, and fit.  I've looked for joggers for over a year now. I've bought a couple of joggers (one is name brand, one is off-brand, one pair from a big box store, and another pair from the ladies department at an outdoors/sports store) from different places, but I never quite liked the fit. So, overall, I LOVE THESE PANTS!! I like the Lisbin cargo jogger pants version better than the non-cargo. The cargo joggers feel a little roomier in the waist and thighs, but still have a shape and aren't baggy.  I'm 5'7" and I weigh 170. I ordered the Large size.  Whether you purchase the cargo or regular joggers from Lisbin, I think you'll be happy with your purchase.
I bought these pants so they would work in two ways… For fashion pants and for hiking pants. They are perfect for both! I’m 5’ 3” 135 pounds. I purchased a medium and they fit perfectly.
These are so comfortable. I wear them everytime I get on a plane. Great pockets!

I've bought these pants multiple times. I like how they fit and wear. They're comfortable. I finally made a discovery. I couldn't understand why the white tops/tanks/camisoles I wore with the pant when I worked out - even light-colored pajamas I wore later that evening - were turning gray.  Well, come to find out the black in these pants was rubbing off on my skin, even if I'd washed the pants dozens of times. Right after I worked out, recently, I was ready to jump in the shower, I put alcohol on a cotton round and rubbed it on my thighs to see if the pants were the culprit. Gray rubbed off. And I've owned these pants for a while; washed a ton of times.  There's no way this is healthy. I've thrown all of them away. This is unacceptable and, possibly, unhealthy.  This is no joke.
The fit was great.  Price was wonderful.  Can't wait to take them on vacation.
These are very comfortable. But I had to steam the wrinkles out from packaging. And this is after I washed them. It’s no biggy. Just letting everyone know.
Feels like I’m wearing thin plastic. No stretch, so order big.
Size was good fit, material had,a slight stretch.
I love these pants. True to size. Great quality. I would buy another pair.

I bought these for my honeymoon. We went to Thailand and Jordan so I wanted something that could work in both locations, protect me from the elements, and be modest for both locations.  These pants are amazing! They’re extremely light weight and protect you from the sun, I didn’t get any sunburn at all during our entire trip away. They’re worth buying

I ordered a small and am 5'4" and 128. They fit comfortably and are roomy which I like yet attractive looking. Love the zippered pockets for travel as I can know my phone etc. are secure when I zip up the pockets.

Material is a nice weight and has a decent stretch, but not super stretchy. Zipper quality is good as well.
No dorky pants here....these look fantastic on!!!!  Great value they are comfy and stylish.  Highly recommend.
Love these joggers! The material is so soft and moves with you.

Great quality, TOO SMALL! not a lot of elasticity or stretch. Not to good for the curvy girls! :) fit everywhere but the hips. Sent them back, but would definitely buy a larger size. I bought XL, I am 5’5 and weight about 200 lbs carrying a lot in my thighs, hips, and booty. Hope this helps!

I really like these joggers! My waist is 27in and my hips are 39in, so I fall in between sizes in most things. If you want a tighter look, I would go with a small, but the medium is perfect if you want a looser fit in the hips. The medium is a little too big in the waist, but no problem if you double knot the drawstrings.
Medium feels like a small

These are so soft & comfy. I've lost weight & could've used a small, but these are truly nice.

I really love these, so much so that I bought them in another color, as well as 2 more in the cargo style.  I needed something lightweight that I could wear to the barn during the unbearable heat while keeping my legs covered.  Hay doesn't stick to my legs from the sweat, water repels right off, and I feel more protected from ticks and other bugs.  I wouldn't say they're mosquito-proof, but it is better than wearing leggings or something that is tight next to your skin.  I will probably buy more later, too, but 4 pairs for now are fine.Also, I bought the medium.  I'm 5'1 and weigh 130 lbs.  They fit just how I'd like them to.
They are nice pants. Light weight and comfortable. I especially like the zip pockets.
Great joggers. They run very large, so size down. I’m 5”8, 130 lbs and the size xs fits perfect.

Super lightweight and comfortable. I got them for summer hiking.
i like these pants, overall size is ok Except the waist - very very tight.

These are a better fit for people who carry their weight in the upper body.

评论概述: Different colors are NOT the same size!
评论详情: I really love these pants, they are just op big on me. I originally tried the black, and they fit really nice so I also bought the pink and the green. O took the tags off the pink and green because I had tried on the black and they fit well. I go to wear the pink and the green pants on a trip, and they are huge on me! I only brought a specific amount of clothing on the trip so I was forced to wear the pants even though they are too big! Now that I took the tags off and wore them they are probably not returnable, so I’m stuck with pants that are way too big now. My suggestion is try these on before you take the tags off and wear them, so you don’t waste your money like I did. Otherwise, the pair that fit me are great!
These worked great on cooler days. Pocket to put your keys or phone.
Returning. The fabric is strange. Says waterproof

Ideal for warm weather walking or jogging.  Like the secured pockets with zip.  Relaxed fit makes it comfortable.

I love these pants and have purchased them in almost every color for travel and daily wear. Lightweight, easy to wash, quick drying and wrinkle free after multiple wears! They’re my go to plane wear and travel gear. Can pair with a nice blouse or tank or tee for different looks. Or with sneakers or slides.
I now have these pants ina variety of colors. They are comfortable and easy to move in when hiking or active. Love the zippered pockets. Quick dry makes them great for travel. Attractive.

I'm 5'6 but ALL legs. I can NEVER find joggers that are long enough on me. These are PERFECT! They are honestly a little long and I roll the bottom. I've never had joggers that are so perfect. Light weight and comfy! 100000/10 recommend!

These fit perfectly and can be dressed up or dressed down. I am a teacher and these are great for work; they are super comfortable. The fabric is high-quality and I consistently get compliments on them. :)

First of all, they fit very well and are flattering. I love the elastic waist, the zippered pockets, and the elastic ankle. The fabric is very soft and appears to be very well constructed. I haven’t washed them yet, so I can’t comment on that but I will not be putting it in the dryer. I’m planning on ordering a black pair. Would definitely recommend these pants.

I am trying to lose a little weight & these are perfect workout pants for me. Last year I ordered a size XXL & a size XL. Now those are both too big for me, so I ordered myself two size L pants. Who knows, but maybe I will need to order myself two size M pants next year!
